pitt.search.semanticvectors

Class FlagConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitt.search.semanticvectors.FlagConfig

  • public class FlagConfig
extends Object
    Class for representing and parsing command line flags into a configuration instance to be passed to other components. Nearly all flags are configured once when an instance is created. Exceptions are dimension() and {#link vectortype()}, since these can be set when a VectorStore is opened for reading.
    Author:
    Dominic Widdows

    • Field Detail

      • remainingArgs

        public String[] remainingArgs

      • seedlength

        public int seedlength

    • Method Detail

      • dimension

        public int dimension()
        Dimension of semantic vector space, default value 200. Can be set when a VectorStore is opened. Recommended values are in the hundreds for VectorType.REAL and VectorType.COMPLEX and in the thousands for VectorType.BINARY, since binary dimensions are single bits.

      • setDimension

        public void setDimension(int dimension)
        Sets the dimension().

      • vectortype

        public VectorType vectortype()
        Ground field for vectors: real, binary or complex. Can be set when a VectorStore is opened. Default value VectorType.REAL, corresponding to "-vectortype real".

      • setVectortype

        public void setVectortype(VectorType vectortype)
        Sets the vectortype().

      • realbindmethod

        public RealVector.RealBindMethod realbindmethod()
        The binding method used for real vectors, see RealVector.BIND_METHOD.

      • elementalmethod

        public ElementalVectorStore.ElementalGenerationMethod elementalmethod()
        The method used for generating elemental vectors.

      • seedlength

        public int seedlength()
        Number of nonzero entries in a sparse random vector, default value 10 except for when vectortype() is VectorType.BINARY, in which case default of dimension() / 2 is enforced by makeFlagsCompatible().

      • minfrequency

        public int minfrequency()
        Minimum frequency of a term for it to be indexed, default value 0.

      • maxfrequency

        public int maxfrequency()
        Maximum frequency of a term for it to be indexed, default value Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • maxnonalphabetchars

        public int maxnonalphabetchars()
        Maximum number of nonalphabetic characters in a term for it to be indexed, default value Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • mintermlength

        public int mintermlength()
        Minimum number of characters in a term

      • filteroutnumbers

        public boolean filteroutnumbers()
        If true, terms containing only numeric characters are filtered out during indexing, default value true.

      • bindnotreleasehack

        public boolean bindnotreleasehack()
        !hack! bind instead of release when constructing queries

      • hybridvectors

        public boolean hybridvectors()
        If true, the StringEdit Class will produce hybrid vectors where each term vector = orthographic vector + semantic vector (from -queryvectorfile), default value false.

      • numsearchresults

        public int numsearchresults()
        Number of search results to return, default value 20.

      • treceval

        public int treceval()
        Output search results in trec_eval format, with query number = treceval

      • jsonfile

        public String jsonfile()
        Output search results as graph representation of a connectivity matrix in JSON

      • pathfinderQ

        public int pathfinderQ()

      • pathfinderR

        public double pathfinderR()

      • searchresultsminscore

        public double searchresultsminscore()
        Search results with similarity scores below this value will not be included in search results, default value -1.

      • numclusters

        public int numclusters()
        Number of clusters used in ClusterResults and ClusterVectorStore, default value 10.

      • trainingcycles

        public int trainingcycles()
        Number of training cycles used for Reflective Random Indexing in BuildIndex.

      • rescaleintraining

        public boolean rescaleintraining()
        If true, use VectorStoreRAM.createRedistributedVectorStore(pitt.search.semanticvectors.VectorStore, pitt.search.semanticvectors.FlagConfig, int) to make uniform coordinate distributions when using several trainingcycles.

      • windowradius

        public int windowradius()
        Window radius used in BuildPositionalIndex, default value 5.

      • searchtype

        public Search.SearchType searchtype()
        Method used for combining and searching vectors, default value Search.SearchType.SUM corresponding to "-searchtype sum".

      • fieldweight

        public boolean fieldweight()
        Set to true if you want document vectors built from multiple fields to emphasize terms from shorter fields, default value false.

      • termweight

        public LuceneUtils.TermWeight termweight()
        Term weighting used when constructing document vectors, default value LuceneUtils.TermWeight.NONE

      • porterstemmer

        public boolean porterstemmer()
        Tells IndexFilePositions to stem terms using Porter Stemmer, default value false.

      • usetermweightsinsearch

        public boolean usetermweightsinsearch()
        Tells search implementations to scale each comparison score by a term weight during search, default value false.

      • stdev

        public boolean stdev()
        Score search results according to number of SDs above the mean across all search vectors, default false.

      • expandsearchspace

        public boolean expandsearchspace()
        Generate bound products from each pairwise element of the search space, default false. Expands the size of the space to n-squared.

      • indexfileformat

        public VectorStoreUtils.VectorStoreFormat indexfileformat()
        Format used for serializing / deserializing vectors from disk, default lucene.

      • termvectorsfile

        public String termvectorsfile()
        File to which termvectors are written during indexing.

      • docvectorsfile

        public String docvectorsfile()
        File to which docvectors are written during indexing.

      • termtermvectorsfile

        public String termtermvectorsfile()
        File to which term-term vectors are written during positional indexing.

      • queryvectorfile

        public String queryvectorfile()
        Principal vector store for finding query vectors, default termvectors.bin.

      • searchvectorfile

        public String searchvectorfile()
        Vector store for searching. Defaults to being the same as queryvectorfile. May be different from queryvectorfile e.g., when using terms to search for documents.

      • boundvectorfile

        public String boundvectorfile()
        Auxiliary vector store used when searching for boundproducts. Used only in some searchtypes.

      • elementalvectorfile

        public String elementalvectorfile()
        Random elemental vectors, sometimes written out, and used (e.g.) in conjunction with permuted vector file.

      • semanticvectorfile

        public String semanticvectorfile()
        Semantic vectors; used so far as a name in PSI.

      • predicatevectorfile

        public String predicatevectorfile()
        Vectors used to represent predicates in PSI.

      • permutedvectorfile

        public String permutedvectorfile()
        "Permuted term vectors, output by -positionalmethod permutation.

      • proximityvectorfile

        public String proximityvectorfile()
        "Permuted term vectors, output by -positionalmethod proximity.

      • directionalvectorfile

        public String directionalvectorfile()
        Permuted term vectors, output by -positionalmethod directional.

      • permplustermvectorfile

        public String permplustermvectorfile()
        "Permuted term vectors, output by -positionalmethod permutationplusbasic.

      • positionalmethod

        public TermTermVectorsFromLucene.PositionalMethod positionalmethod()
        Method used for positional indexing.

      • stoplistfile

        public String stoplistfile()
        Path to file containing stopwords, one word per line, no default value.

      • startlistfile

        public String startlistfile()
        Path to file containing startwords, to be indexed always, no default value.

      • luceneindexpath

        public String luceneindexpath()
        Path to a Lucene index. Must contain term position information for positional applications, See BuildPositionalIndex.

      • initialtermvectors

        public String initialtermvectors()
        If set, use the vectors in this file for initialization instead of new random vectors.

      • initialdocumentvectors

        public String initialdocumentvectors()
        If set, use the vectors in this file for initialization instead of new random vectors.

      • docindexing

        public DocVectors.DocIndexingStrategy docindexing()
        Memory management method used for indexing documents.

      • vectorlookupsyntax

        public CompoundVectorBuilder.VectorLookupSyntax vectorlookupsyntax()
        Method used for looking up vectors in a vector store, default value CompoundVectorBuilder.VectorLookupSyntax.EXACTMATCH.

      • matchcase

        public boolean matchcase()
        If true, matching of query terms is case-sensitive; otherwise case-insensitive, default false.

      • batchcompareseparator

        public String batchcompareseparator()
        Separator for documents on a single line in batch comparison mode, default '\\|' (as a regular expression for '|').

      • suppressnegatedqueries

        public boolean suppressnegatedqueries()
        If true, suppress checking for the query negation token which indicates subsequent terms are to be negated when comparing terms, default false. If this is set to true, all terms are treated as positive.

      • contentsfields

        public String[] contentsfields()
        Fields to be indexed for their contents, e.g., "title,description,notes", default "contents".

      • setContentsfields

        public void setContentsfields(String[] contentsfields)
        Set contentsfields (e.g. to specify for TermFilter

      • docidfield

        public String docidfield()
        Field used by Lucene to record the identifier for each document, default "path".

      • parseFlagsFromString

        public static FlagConfig parseFlagsFromString(String header)
        Parse flags from a single string. Presumes that string contains only command line flags.

      • getFlagConfig

        public static FlagConfig getFlagConfig(String[] args)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parse command line flags and create public data structures for accessing them.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Returns:
        trimmed list of arguments with command line flags consumed
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

                                                 FlagConfig target)
